data.title: Ecuador's government rejected a US Supreme Court ruling ordering the country to pay oil-giant Chevron a $96 million judgement for breach of contract: The government insists that the oil-giant should pay Ecuador reparations for thousands of oil spills in Amazon Rainforest

Bangladesh to ban Islamic TV channel, Peace TV, in the wake of the deadly attack on a cafe in the capital, Dhaka. The government's decision comes amid fears that hardline views on the channel could radicalise youth.
